name: Kaguya Pong Remake
description:
I used the source code from: 

https://github.com/LiterallyFabian/Kaguya-pong

This game is a highly saturated/pixelated version of the Kaguya Pong that "LiterallyFabian" made.

*I did NOT make the game I repeat I did NOT make the game. All I did was make the images more saturated/pixalated.

Up Arrow/Down Arrow: Right Paddle
W/S: Left Paddle
